name: Cubiqum
description:
A very simple puzzle game where you try to form small shapes out of planes by folding them.

We had to do this in our 10 hours while on vacation so do not expect much.
The solutions require:
* A cube
* A 2x1x1 square prism with open sides
* A 2x1x1 square prism
* A 3x1x1 square prism (this one is a bit hard)

19/08/18 Critical bugfix for advancing levels!

Good luck and have fun!
